text: Speed is a 1994 American action-thriller movie set in Los Angeles, California. It stars Keanu Reeves, Sandra Bullock, Jeff Daniels, Alan Ruck, and Dennis Hopper with Joe Morton. It is about a police officer (Reeves) who has to stop a extortionist (Hopper), who has put a bomb on a city bus. The movie was a box office success in many countries. It was followed by a 1997 sequel, Speed 2: Cruise Control. == Other websites == * * Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:1994 action movies Category:1994 crime thriller movies Category:1990s American action movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:Chase movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Movies about extortion Category:Movies about murderers Category:Movies set in Los Angeles
title: Speed (1994 movie)
